headline: Lennar Governance Vote Puts Dual Class Structure And Valuation In Focus
summary: Lennar (NYSE:LEN) faces shareholder proposals on voting transparency and equal voting rights ahead of its April 2026 annual meeting. Investors are asking for voting results to be disclosed by share class and for the company to move toward one share, one vote. Lennar's board has recommended that shareholders vote against these governance measures, setting up a potential debate at the meeting. Lennar, one of the largest U.S. homebuilders, sits at the intersection of housing demand, interest...
